mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content1: Fake Lumos was born from the need to combat the growing wave of disinformation in our society. Our mission is to empower people with tools and knowledge to identify and combat fake news.
mission.content2: Through the combination of advanced technology and digital education, we seek to create a more reliable and transparent online environment.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content1: We aspire to create a more conscious and critical society regarding the information it consumes. We envision a future where every citizen has the tools and knowledge necessary to distinguish facts from fiction.
vision.content2: We want to be a reference in combating disinformation, contributing to a healthier and fact-based public debate.

development.title: Development Start
development.content: The project began as a final work in the 'Algorithm, Politics and Society' course at UFBA, under the guidance of Prof. Dr. Paulo Fonseca.

ai.title: AI Development
ai.content: Implementation of text analysis algorithms and integration with fact-checking APIs to improve verification accuracy.

launch.title: Launch
launch.content: Making the tool available to the public, with focus on usability and accessibility.
